map.title: Rare Earth Explorer

skeleton.name: Skeleton Warrior
skeleton.background: The Ashlands are full of buried bones; these skeletons were once militia who still wander with broken blades after the kingdom fell.

zombie.name: Rotten Zombie
zombie.background: When the bells tolled for the plague, the abbey refused to burn the dead — the rotten learned hate beneath hymns.

goblin.name: Goblin
goblin.background: Cave goblins are born in collapsed shafts; they steal more than coin — they steal a winter's fire taken by nobles.

wolf.name: Wolf
wolf.background: Packs of wolves prowl the woods, keen-scented and swift — a common threat in the novice woodland.

storm_titan.name: Storm Titan
storm_titan.background: Storm Titan Oros was forged by gods to judge mortals; now it remembers thunder but not mercy.

scarlet_queen.name: Scarlet Queen
scarlet_queen.background: Scarlet Queen Selina swallowed blood oaths on the night of the coup; she wrote throne and curse into her pulse.

void_reaper.name: Void Reaper
void_reaper.background: Void Reaper Naeil walks the star gaps, reaping not only life but forgotten hope.

clockwork_core.name: Clockwork Core
clockwork_core.background: The runaway core was once the city's power heart; when the coup cut power it treated the city as a fault to be cleared.

dark_spider.background: Dark spiders lurk in ruined halls, weaving webs laced with lingering curses.
dark_spider.name: Dark Spider

fire_imp.background: Fire imps are mischievous embers made flesh; they skitter from forge to camp stealing warmth.
fire_imp.name: Fire Imp

ice_wolf.background: Ice wolves hunt across frozen plains; their breath crystallizes armor and bones alike.
ice_wolf.name: Ice Wolf

thunder_eagle.background: Thunder eagles nest on storm-swept cliffs and strike like blades of lightning.
thunder_eagle.name: Thunder Eagle

plague_mushroom.background: Plague mushrooms colonize damp ruins, exuding spores that rot both memory and marrow.
plague_mushroom.name: Plague Mushroom

venom_hydra.background: Venom Hydras coil in poisoned springs, each head tasting centuries of decay.
venom_hydra.name: Venom Hydra

abyss_demon.introLine: Azral commences the tribunal against your greed.
abyss_demon.battleLogLine: The abyssal codex turns; black flame traces your shadow.

phase.entering: The tribunal bell echoes through the rift.
phase.dying: The litany of judgment begins to crumble.
phase.dropping: The scales of judgment finally tip.

venom_hydra.introLine: A hissing chorus answers the springs — the Venom Hydra awakens.
venom_hydra.battleLogLine: Toxic steam clouds the field as heads strike like knives.

phase.entering: A chorus of hisses fills the cavern.
phase.dying: The hydra's heads writhe as the venom ebbs.
phase.dropping: The poisoned well settles into silence.

thorns: This enemy punishes burst damage; high tempo can backfire.
A safer approach is to increase survivability and sustain, extending effective combat time.
lifesteal: This enemy excels at sustaining through fights; prolonging combat amplifies its advantage.
Prepare continuous pressure to reduce its healing windows.
double_attack: This enemy tends to attack in quick succession, creating momentary pressure.
Prioritize survivability and damage mitigation to avoid being overwhelmed by chains.
shield_on_start: This enemy starts with a strong defense; early bursts are less effective.
Establish a steady rhythm and look for openings to break through.
rage_on_low_hp: This enemy becomes more dangerous in the late phase; finishing moves are critical.
Reserve late-stage resources to avoid being outpaced in the endgame.

codex.title: Monster Codex
codex.selectMonster: Select a monster to view details
codex.backgroundFallback: This monster's history is fragmented and incomplete.

codex.hints.bossIntro: This is a boss encounter — focus your build around a single tactical core rather than spreading resources.
codex.hints.normalIntro: This is a regular encounter — prefer stable, general-purpose builds for consistent progression.
codex.hints.counterGoal: This enemy has a clear counter-goal; focus on one advantage dimension to strengthen.
codex.hints.simple: This enemy has a simple mechanic — balanced offense and defense usually suffices.

login.subtitle: Select an existing profile to continue your adventure
login.noProfiles: No saved profiles — create a character on the right
login.createSubtitle: Enter a player name to create a local profile
